A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Okay lot of spoilers here.

Too many attempts at comedy moments.....2-3 would have been fine\, not every scene. Superman Leia was crap. With just a minimal amount of editing\, could have give Leia a great death scene that would worked and give Carrie a scene to go out as a star\, didn't happen. The whole movie seemed like any chance they had to have a great story arc or side plot was ignored. Snoke is the big bad Supreme leader....no backstory\, just dead. The love story angle of Finn/Rose.....meh\, doesn't work for me. The Kylo/Ren one was okay\, kinda a yin-yang thing going. Rey being a master lightsaber wielder with 1 day of training....I didn't buy it in Force Awakens\, I don't buy it now. Luke took practice and training to be able to do what he did\, now Rey comes along and is equal in a couple days.....no\, just no.

I enjoyed the action scenes\, but I think Mark Hamil had it right when he disagreed with everything about his character arc. The acting was okay....but I think the writing was rubbish.
